name: STD Foundation Classes
short_description:
by http://www.softdie.ca

 A fully integrated & "object oriented" set of Classes for the following products: PowerBuilder Classic, Appeon Web, Appeon Mobile, Web Services (.Net IIs), The component frameworks greatly enhance the development process making the PowerBuilder or Appeon developer significantly more productive!

License:  https://sourceforge.net/projects/stdfndclass/files/License

=> Updated version of the STD "Order Entry" example application (Version 5.6.0.30) released on 2015-04-28.

https://sourceforge.net/projects/stdfndclass/files/Applications/PowerBuilder/OrderEntry/

=> Updated version of the STD "Integrated" framework (Version #5.6.0.30 - Service Pack#5) was released to production (GA) on 2015-04-29.

https://sourceforge.net/projects/stdfndclass/files/FrameWork/Integrated/

=> Updated version of the STD "Web Service" framework (Version 2005.2.0.45 - 2005R2) was released to production (GA) on 2015-05-30.

https://sourceforge.net
summary: Object oriented frameworks for PowerBuilder Classic and Appeon
